title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 853.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 853.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part shall apply to any person who, on
or after the effective date of this Part, holds a current credential or
initiates an application for a new credential or designation, or to renew or
reinstate an existing or inactive credential or designation issued and overseen
by the Office pursuant to this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
